thread.title: Lenovo P2 with 5.5-inch display and 5,100mAh battery launching in India on January 11th
thread.title_full: Lenovo P2 with 5.5-inch display and 5,100mAh battery launching in India on January 11th

title: Lenovo P2 with 5.5-inch display and 5,100mAh battery launching in India on January 11th
text:
Lenovo P2 with 5.5-inch display and 5,100mAh battery launching in India on... Lenovo P2 with 5.5-inch display and 5,100mAh battery launching in India on January 11th By January 9, 2017 “The Lenovo P2 is a mid-range Android phablet with an all-metal design” 
Lenovo has been teasing the launch of the P2 smartphone in India for the past couple of days. Today, the company has finally announced that the smartphone will be launched in the country on January 11th at 12.30pm. There’s no word on the price of the device yet, but the brand did reveal that it will be available exclusively on Flipkart. 
For the uninitiated, the main highlight of the Lenovo P2 is its 5,100mAh battery with fast charging support. It features a metal unibody design, a 5.5-inch full HD display, a Snapdragon 625 processor, 3GB / 4GB of RAM, 32GB / 64GB storage, Android Marshmallow, 13MP/5MP cameras, 4G LTE, and NFC.
